messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: peaceful parenting tape
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/23/03 9:53:19 AM, sheran@ptd.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/23/03 9:53:19 AM, sheran@... writes:

<< There's another one there, though. The practicalities of

unschooling. I don't remember that one before. Is that from this

year maybe? There's another one there too by Richard Prystowsky

called The Heart of Homeschooling. Were they there before and I just

missed them or are they new? >>

They were there.

Practicalities of Unschooling is another intro to unschooling.
Peaceful Parenting is listed under my name and Richard's both--it was a duet.
<g>

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: peaceful parenting tape
messages.msgSnippet: Here s the order form: http://conference.hsc.org/tapes2002.html The many benefits of video games was really good too. There s another one there, though.  The
messages.messageBody:
Here's the order form:

http://conference.hsc.org/tapes2002.html

The many benefits of video games was really good too.

There's another one there, though. The practicalities of
unschooling. I don't remember that one before. Is that from this
year maybe? There's another one there too by Richard Prystowsky
called The Heart of Homeschooling. Were they there before and I just
missed them or are they new?

Sheila

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: peaceful parenting tape
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/15/03 7:42:10 AM, bunsofaluminum60@hotmail.com writes:  I have some and will get
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/15/03 7:42:10 AM, bunsofaluminum60@... writes:

<< Where does one acquire this peaceful parenting tape? >>

I have some and will get some more to sell in South Carolina, but really the
cheapest, fastest and easiest way to get them is here:

http://www.hsc.org/tapes2002.html

Peaceful Parenting was a joint presentation of Richard Prystowsky and
myself, so it's listed under both names.
<A HREF="http://www.hsc.org/tapes2002.html">HSC - Home School Conference
Tapes 2002</A>
Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: peaceful parenting tape

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] peaceful parenting tape
messages.msgSnippet: I got the tape, sure enjoyed it.  I feel like I ve gotten a tiny taste of something I want much more of!  LOL!  I am eyeing a couple books by Thich Nhat Hanh
messages.messageBody:
I got the tape, sure enjoyed it. I feel like I've gotten a tiny taste of
something I want much more of! LOL! I am eyeing a couple books by Thich
Nhat Hanh on Ebay. I also really appreciated Sandra's insistance on the tape
to take the change over to peaceful parenting one step at a time, to not
expect a change right away. Do you have any more tapes Sandra? :o)

Nancy B
